(:action place ; Place an item into another container or onto a surface
    :parameters (?entity - object ?target - container_or_surface)
    :precondition (and 
        (or (in_package ?entity) (in_bowl ?entity) (holding_flour_and_salt ?target))
        (or (empty ?target) (flattened ?entity) (selected ?entity))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (or (in_bowl ?entity ?target) 
            (on_sheet ?entity ?target) 
            (in_container ?entity ?target)
        )

(:action remove ; Remove an item from a location and update its status
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?location - location ?device - device)
    :precondition (and (in_location ?item ?location) (not (in_use ?device)))
    :effect (and (removed_from_location ?item ?location) (in_use ?device))

(:action press ; Press an item into a container or surface
:parameters (?item - object ?surface - surface)
:precondition (and (located ?item) (on_surface ?surface))
:effect (and (pressed ?item ?surface) (on_surface ?surface))

(:action create ; Create an entity by combining resources and updating states
 :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - resource ?location - location)
 :precondition (and (available ?agent) (at ?location) (contains ?resource ?location) (not (created ?resource)))
 :effect (and (created ?resource) (updated_state ?location))
